name: Killer
text: Your Turn — Once Per Turn — When DON!! is returned from your field to your DON!! deck, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

effect.text: When DON!! is returned from your field to your DON!! deck, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
